title: Olomouc
summary: Olomouc (UK: /ˈɒləmoʊts/,[2] US: /ˈoʊloʊ-/,[3] Czech: [ˈolomouts] (listen); locally Olomóc; German: Olmütz, pronounced [ˈɔlmʏt͡s]; Polish: Ołomuniec [ɔwɔˈmuɲɛts]; Latin: Olomucium or Iuliomontium) is a city in the east of the Czech Republic. It has about 100,000 inhabitants, and its larger urban zone has a population of about 384,000 inhabitants (2019).[4]
